name: Nightmare Of Melanie
description: Players will constantly experience their inner voice between the truth and fear from Ling's perspective, and face the most cruel fate hidden in the deepest darkness after the horizon is clear and swept by fear one after another...
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 Win 8 Win10 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz Graphics: 1024x768 High Color + DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
